title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 186.9 - Advertising
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 186.9 - Advertising

State Regulations

Agriculture and Markets Law, ยง 159

Any advertisement of apples for sale at a given price shall
plainly and conspicuously indicate and state the grade and variety of the
apples so advertised. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
186.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
